header.title: Telegram Chat Analytics
header.description: Detailed analytics of messages and user activity from your chat history

upload.title: Upload your chat
upload.description: Upload your Telegram chat export file to generate analytics

dropzone.title: Drop your Telegram chat export here
dropzone.description: or click to select JSON file

errors.invalidFile: Invalid file format. Please upload a JSON file
errors.readError: Error reading file. Please try again
errors.parseError: Error parsing JSON. Please make sure the file is valid
errors.noMessages: No messages found in the file

videoMessages.noMessagesDesc: There are no video messages in this chat yet

firstMessages.description: Number of times a user started a conversation after 12+ hours of silence

totalMessages.description: Number of messages sent by each participant

timeOfDay.description: Distribution of messages by time of day

reactions.noReactionsDesc: No one has used reactions in this chat yet

forwardedMessages.title: Forwarded Messages
forwardedMessages.noMessagesDesc: There are no forwarded messages from other chats yet

share.securityInfoDescription1: Your data is securely protected with end-to-end encryption. Only those with the link can decrypt and view the report.
share.securityInfoDescription2: Only encrypted aggregated data (charts and statistics) is stored in the database. Original messages are never stored or transmitted.

privacyNotice.description: All processing happens in your browser - data is never sent to the server.

meta.title: Telegram Chat Analyzer - Detailed Message Analytics
meta.description: Detailed analytics of messages and user activity from your chat history
meta.keywords: Telegram, analytics, statistics, chats, message analysis, data visualization, user activity

howTo.title: How to download chat history from Telegram

step1.title: 1. Open Telegram Desktop
step1.description: Data export is only available in the desktop version of Telegram, you can download it

step2.title: 2. Open export settings
step2.item1: Open the dialog with the user you're interested in
step2.item2: Click on the three dots to the right of the user's name and select "Export chat history"
step2.item3: If you don't have this option, it means your Telegram version was not downloaded from the official website, but from an app store. Download the official version from the official website.

step3.title: 3. Configure export
step3.item2: Uncheck all options in the settings

step4.title: 4. Upload the file
step4.description: After exporting, upload the resulting JSON file to this website for the report
